featured.text: Most of the performance was not accompanied by any instrument.
33 Paper lanterns and offerings are sent floating down rivers to accompany the ancestors back to their resting place.
The pyramid housed the pharaoh’s body together with priceless treasure, which would accompany him into the next world.
Usually a stye is accompanied by a swollen eye.

definition.en_def: To go along with or be in the company of someone or something.
definition.example: She decided to accompany her friend to the concert.
